old:
素材の中でも高値で取り引きされるのは
やっぱりデカイ魔物の牙や皮だな
column2: Among the materials, what is traded at a high price is, after all, the fangs and skin of large enemies.
speaker: Owen

old:
特に部位を狙って攻撃しないと
取れない素材が人気だよ
見つけたら即買いする人も多いしね
column2: Especially popular are materials that can only be obtained by targeting specific parts. Many people even buy them immediately when they find them.
speaker: Owen

old:
売りたい物や手に入れたい物があったら
気軽に相談してくださいよ！！
column2: If you have something you'd like to sell or get, feel free to talk to me!
speaker: Owen

old:
いらっしゃい～！
掘り出し物は早い者勝ちだよ～！
column2:
Welcome～!
The early bird gets the worm!
speaker: Owen

old: オーウェンのバザーにようこそ！
speaker: Owen
